title: Fewer HK people joining protest rallies? Here's why.

Also, we're learning new ways to demonstrate.
instead of having one huge rally at one location, allowing the police to plan in advance and set traps, we're slowly morphing into smaller localized demonstrations and flash mobs.

This is main reason
